codes.code: argmax 'The task at hand involves answering a series of Latin questions, which will involve geographical locations, Latin vocabulary, and Roman numerals. Make sure you understand the question and respond correctly and succinctly in Latin. Provide the answer only. 1. Saccus quī hīc est = h~ saccus. Choose from this set of possible answers [ ic, aec, oc, ae aec, od oc, ī ic] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-003' where ANSWER in [ 'ic', 'aec', 'oc', 'ae aec', 'od oc', 'ī ic']
